docs.title: zebrafish-toxicology-atlas-schema
docs.text:
Schema to represent metadatcha associated with the Zebrafish Toxicology Atlas

URI: https://w3id.org/sierra-moxon/zebrafish-toxicology-atlas-schema

Name: zebrafish-toxicology-atlas-schema

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Entity The base class for all entities in the Zebrafish Toxicology Atlas Schema ChemicalEntity The chemical used as the stressor chemical in an exposure event ExposureEvent An occurrence in a study where a subject is exposed to a stressor under defin... ExposureExperiment An experimental procedure in which a subject is exposed to a defined stressor... Fish Zebrafish used as subject in the study Image An image associated with a phenotype observation ObservationSet Group of observations (phenotypic outcomes and their control) that are linked... Phenotype Any measurable or visible trait change in the subject as a result of exposure PhenotypeObservation A phenotypic outcome resulting from an exposure event Regimen The schedule and pattern of an exposure event StressorChemical A chemical, that elicit a response (a phenotype) in a subject when when encou... Study A toxicological investigation, including the experimental conditions and phen... QuantityValue A value of an attribute that is quantitative and measurable, expressed as a c...

Name or label of an entity number_of_individual_exposure Total number of individual exposures numeric_value The numeric value of the quantity value observation_set The observation set in a study exhibiting this phenotype publication The publication identifier (e rearing_condition_comment Comments on rearing conditions, for example, about how conditions deviated fr... regimen The regimen for the exposure resolution Level of detail of the image route The route of exposure scale_bar Scale bar information, including the physical length it represents and the un... severity The intensity of the observed phenotype stage The developmental stage of fish when the phenotype was observed standard_rearing_condition An indication if the subject was maintained under standard conditions, which ... total_exposure_duration Time between first and last individual exposure unit The unit of the quantity value uuid UUID identifier vehicle The substance or medium used deliver a stressor

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description ExposureRegimenTypeEnum An enumeration of exposure regimen types ExposureRouteEnum An enumeration of exposure routes derived from the EXO ontology ExposureTypeEnum An enumeration of exposure types derived from the ECTO ontology SeverityEnum An enumeration of severity levels for phenotypes VehicleEnumeration An enumeration of vehicles used in exposures

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Class: Entity
docs.text:
The base class for all entities in the Zebrafish Toxicology Atlas Schema.

  • NOTE: this is an abstract class and should not be instantiated directly

URI: zebrafish_toxicology_atlas_schema:Entity

 classDiagram
    class Entity
    click Entity href "../Entity/"
      Entity <|-- Study
        click Study href "../Study/"
      Entity <|-- ObservationSet
        click ObservationSet href "../ObservationSet/"
      Entity <|-- PhenotypeObservation
        click PhenotypeObservation href "../PhenotypeObservation/"
      Entity <|-- Phenotype
        click Phenotype href "../Phenotype/"
      Entity <|-- ExposureExperiment
        click ExposureExperiment href "../ExposureExperiment/"
      Entity <|-- ExposureEvent
        click ExposureEvent href "../ExposureEvent/"
      Entity <|-- Regimen
        click Regimen href "../Regimen/"
      Entity <|-- StressorChemical
        click StressorChemical href "../StressorChemical/"
      Entity <|-- ChemicalEntity
        click ChemicalEntity href "../ChemicalEntity/"
      Entity <|-- Image
        click Image href "../Image/"
      Entity <|-- Fish
        click Fish href "../Fish/"

      Entity : uuid

docs.title: Class: ExposureEvent
docs.text:
An occurrence in a study where a subject is exposed to a stressor under defined conditions.

URI: zebrafish_toxicology_atlas_schema:ExposureEvent

 classDiagram
    class ExposureEvent
    click ExposureEvent href "../ExposureEvent/"
      Entity <|-- ExposureEvent
        click Entity href "../Entity/"

      ExposureEvent : additional_exposure_condition

      ExposureEvent : comment

      ExposureEvent : exposure_end_stage

      ExposureEvent : exposure_start_stage

      ExposureEvent : exposure_type





        ExposureEvent --> "0..1" ExposureTypeEnum : exposure_type
        click ExposureTypeEnum href "../ExposureTypeEnum/"



      ExposureEvent : regimen





        ExposureEvent --> "0..1" Regimen : regimen
        click Regimen href "../Regimen/"



      ExposureEvent : route





        ExposureEvent --> "0..1" ExposureRouteEnum : route
        click ExposureRouteEnum href "../ExposureRouteEnum/"



      ExposureEvent : stressor





        ExposureEvent --> "*" StressorChemical : stressor
        click StressorChemical href "../StressorChemical/"



      ExposureEvent : uuid

      ExposureEvent : vehicle





        ExposureEvent --> "*" VehicleEnumeration : vehicle
        click VehicleEnumeration href "../VehicleEnumeration/"

docs.title: Class: ExposureExperiment
docs.text:
An experimental procedure in which a subject is exposed to a defined stressor, such as a chemical or environmental factor, to evaluate phenotypic effects.

URI: zebrafish_toxicology_atlas_schema:ExposureExperiment

 classDiagram
    class ExposureExperiment
    click ExposureExperiment href "../ExposureExperiment/"
      Entity <|-- ExposureExperiment
        click Entity href "../Entity/"

      ExposureExperiment : exposure_event





        ExposureExperiment --> "*" ExposureEvent : exposure_event
        click ExposureEvent href "../ExposureEvent/"



      ExposureExperiment : rearing_condition_comment

      ExposureExperiment : standard_rearing_condition

      ExposureExperiment : subject





        ExposureExperiment --> "0..1" Fish : subject
        click Fish href "../Fish/"



      ExposureExperiment : uuid

docs.title: Schema Entity-Relationship Diagram
docs.text:
This diagram shows the entity-relationship model of the Zebrafish Toxicology Atlas Schema.

erDiagram
ChemicalEntity {
    uriorcurie chebi_id  
    string cas_id  
    string chemical_name  
    string uuid  
    stringList synonym  
}
Entity {
    string uuid  
}
ExposureEvent {
    VehicleEnumerationList vehicle  
    ExposureRouteEnum route  
    uriorcurie exposure_start_stage  
    uriorcurie exposure_end_stage  
    string comment  
    ExposureTypeEnum exposure_type  
    string additional_exposure_condition  
    string uuid  
}
ExposureExperiment {
    boolean standard_rearing_condition  
    string rearing_condition_comment  
    string uuid  
}
Fish {
    string name  
    uriorcurie id  
    string uuid  
}
Image {
    string uuid  
    string magnification  
    string resolution  
    string scale_bar  
}
ObservationSet {
    boolean control  
    string uuid  
}
Phenotype {
    uriorcurie stage  
    SeverityEnum severity  
    uriorcurie phenotype_term_id  
    string uuid  
}
PhenotypeObservation {
    boolean control  
    string uuid  
}
QuantityValue {
    string unit  
    string numeric_value  
}
Regimen {
    ExposureRegimenTypeEnum exposure_regimen_type  
    integer number_of_individual_exposure  
    string uuid  
}
